constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 147 (Tuesday, August 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FEENSTRA:
H.R. 5046.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H4338]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Oversight and Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Holding Countries Accountable for Negligent Chemical and Biological Programs Act
